comments.author: christina
comments.content: That looks super good! I bet it was rich and it'll make me feel like gravity has increased. But once in a while ... soul food.

comments.author: Katie B.
comments.content: I third! Totally genius! I cannot imagine the joy created by having enough crunchy layer to go around!

comments.author: Ruth
comments.content: Great, great and may I say...great! dish of comfort food.  Thanks for sharing with Presto Pasta Night.

comments.author: C
comments.content: Mmmm...that does look and sound good!

comments.author: McAuliflower
comments.content:
ha!  genius idea there.  I just returned my Sally Schneider cookbook to the library without copying the mac and cheese protocol. Doh!

glad I found your site.
